Bash(git -C "c:\Users\jtoroni\Data Norm\Data-Norm-2" commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix deployment configurations to prevent image caching issues

## Changes:
- Set imagePullPolicy: Always for identity and gateway deployments
- Add CPA_APP_URL, ADMIN_APP_URL, RD_CLIENT_APP_URL env vars to identity
- Update gateway CORS_ORIGINS to include rdclient subdomain
- Add GitHub Actions workflows for automatic deployment of identity and gateway services

## Why:
- imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent was causing pods to use cached images instead of pulling new versions
- Missing environment variables caused invitation links to use wrong URLs
- CI/CD workflows enable automatic deployments when code changes are pushed

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
